wikipedia_page.main: Sir Edwin Ronald Nixon  (21 June 1925 – 17 August 2008) was an eminent  British  business leader who headed IBM's operations in the country for over 20 years.Born in 1925, he was educated at Alderman Newton's School, Leicester, and Selwyn College, Cambridge. After a spell at  Dexion, he joined IBM UK in 1955 and was successively Managing Director,  Chairman, and Chief Executive before becoming chairman of  Amersham International in 1988. A former Deputy Lieutenant of Hampshire, he died in 2008.
